ComicInfo.Title: Things All Fall Apart- Part 5: "Earthworks"
ComicInfo.Summary: Things All Fall Apart- Part 5: "Earthworks": Menasor attacks the Autobots as Swindle's plan comes to fruition to seize control of the completed spaceship for the Decepticons. Optimus Prime comes to the rescue as himself and Major Witwicky come to terms with each other and form an alliance of sorts to defeat any Decepticon menace still left on Earth, especially in light of the Menasor situation.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev36 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-03-22 17:21:01. [Issue ID 752285]
